財政年度: (ざいせいねんど) - fiscal year; financial year
財政投融資: (ざいせいとうゆうし) - Fiscal Investment and Loan Program; FILP
財政援助: (ざいせいえんじょ) - financial aid; financial assistance; financial help; financial support
財政支出: (ざいせいししゅつ) - government spending
財政支援: (ざいせいしえん) - economic support; financial support
財政改革: (ざいせいかいかく) - economic reform; fiscal reform
財政政策: (ざいせいせいさく) - fiscal policy
財政構造: (ざいせいこうぞう) - fiscal structure
財政状態: (ざいせいじょうたい) - financial condition
財政的: (ざいせいてき) - economic; financial; fiscal
財政調整基金: (ざいせいちょうせいききん) - financial adjustment monies; public finance adjustment reserve funds stipulated in the Local Finance Act
財政関税: (ざいせいかんぜい) - revenue tariff
財政難: (ざいせいなん) - economic difficulties; financial difficulties; fiscal difficulties
財源: (ざいげん) - source of funds; resources; finances
財源確保: (ざいげんかくほ) - securing financial resources
財産を食いつぶす: (ざいさんをくいつぶす) - to run through one's fortune (in idleness)
財産を食い潰す: (ざいさんをくいつぶす) - to run through one's fortune (in idleness)
財産分与: (ざいさんぶんよ) - distribution of property
財産区: (ざいさんく) - property ward; special local public body which has its own property, etc. and bears the expenses for it
財産家: (ざいさんか) - wealthy individual; person of wealth
財産権: (ざいさんけん) - property rights; the right to own property
財産番号: (ざいさんばんごう) - asset register number
財産目録: (ざいさんもくろく) - inventory of property
財産相続: (ざいさんそうぞく) - succession to or inheritance of property
財相: (ざいしょう) - treasurer; treasury minister; finance minister
財閥解体: (ざいばつかいたい) - dissolution of zaibatsu
貢献: (kouken) - contribuição (para o avanço de um objetivo ou causa), serviços (para uma causa)
貢献利益: (こうけんりえき) - {finc} contribution margin; marginal income
貢進: (こうしん) - paying a tribute; contribution; presentation of something to an aristocrat
貧: (hin/bin/mazu) - poor , poverty, becoming poor, living in poverty
貧しい: (mazushii) - poor, needy; lacking (em termos de quantidade e qualidade), poor, scanty, skimpy, slight, inadequate
貧しく暮らす: (まずしくくらす) - to live in poverty
貧する: (ひんする) - to become poor; to be poor
貧すれば鈍する: (ひんすればどんする) - Poverty dulls the wit
貧乏くじ: (びんぼうくじ) - short end of the stick; short straw; unlucky number; blank; bad bargain
貧乏くじを引く: (びんぼうくじをひく) - to get the short end of the stick; to get the bad end of a bargain
貧乏に生まれる: (びんぼうにうまれる) - to be born poor; to be born into poverty
貧乏ひまなし: (びんぼうひまなし) - there is no leisure for the poor
貧乏ゆすり: (びんぼうゆすり) - shaking or tapping (usu. one's foot) unconsciously; fidgeting (esp. of the legs)
貧乏人: (binbounin) - pessoa pobre, indigente, os pobres, os necessitados
貧乏性: (びんぼうしょう) - destined to poverty; parsimonious spirit; tendency to be frugal; poor person's mentality (e.g. inability to relax)
貧乏所帯: (びんぼうじょたい) - (yoji) poor household
貧乏揺すり: (びんぼうゆすり) - shaking or tapping (usu. one's foot) unconsciously; fidgeting (esp. of the legs)
貧乏旅行: (びんぼうりょこう) - budget travel; penniless travel; travelling on the cheap
貧乏暇なし: (びんぼうひまなし) - there is no leisure for the poor
貧乏暇無し: (びんぼうひまなし) - there is no leisure for the poor
貧乏暮し: (びんぼうぐらし) - needy circumstances; living in poverty
貧乏暮らし: (びんぼうぐらし) - needy circumstances; living in poverty
貧乏神: (びんぼうがみ) - god of poverty
貧乏籤: (びんぼうくじ) - short end of the stick; short straw; unlucky number; blank; bad bargain
貧乏籤を引く: (びんぼうくじをひく) - to get the short end of the stick; to get the bad end of a bargain
貧乏臭い: (びんぼうくさい) - shabby; mean; sorry; dingy
貧乏鬮: (びんぼうくじ) - short end of the stick; short straw; unlucky number; blank; bad bargain
貧乳: (ひんにゅう) - (ant: 巨乳) tiny breasts
貧困: (hinkon) - pobreza, penúria, necessidade, indigência; escassez, falta, carência
貧困問題: (びんこんもんだい) - poverty problem; poverty issue
貧困地域: (ひんこんちいき) - poor region; deprived area
貧困女子: (ひんこんじょし) - women with low disposable incomes; poverty girls
貧困層: (ひんこんそう) - underclasses; poorest segment of the population; the poor
貧困者: (ひんこんしゃ) - pauper; the needy; the poor
貧富: (ひんぷ) - wealth and poverty; rich and poor
貧富貴賤: (ひんぷきせん) - (yoji) rich and poor, high and low; people of all ranks
貧小: (ひんしょう) - petty; trivial; trifling; paltry; meager; meagre
貧弱: (ひんじゃく) - poor; meagre; meager; insubstantial
貧栄養湖: (ひんえいようこ) - lake with low nutrient level; oligotrophic lake; unproductive lake
貧歯類: (ひんしるい) - edentates (i.e. anteaters, sloths, armadillos)
